description:
Google is rolling out new features in Chrome to better protect users online and to improve their control over personal data.

The post New Chrome Features Protect Users Against Threats, Provide More Control Over Personal Data appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: New Chrome Features Protect Users Against Threats, Provide More Control Over Personal Data

description:
Operant AI, a startup specializing in runtime protection for cloud applications, APIs, and AI systems, secures new $10 million investment.

The post Operant AI Lands $10M Investment to Boost Runtime Protection for Cloud and AI appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Operant AI Lands $10M Investment to Boost Runtime Protection for Cloud and AI

description:
Realm.Security has emerged from stealth with $5 million in funding and a solution that helps organizations manage security data. 

The post Realm.Security Emerges From Stealth With $5 Million in Seed Funding appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Realm.Security Emerges From Stealth With $5 Million in Seed Funding

description:
Relentless in their methods, attackers will continue employing evasion tactics to circumvent traditional security measures.

The post Evasion Tactics Used By Cybercriminals To Fly Under The Radar appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Evasion Tactics Used By Cybercriminals To Fly Under The Radar

description:
Palo Alto Networks has fixed medium- and high-severity vulnerabilities in PAN-OS, Cortex XDR, ActiveMQ Content Pack, and Prisma Access Browser.

The post Palo Alto Networks Patches Dozens of Vulnerabilities  appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Palo Alto Networks Patches Dozens of Vulnerabilities

description:
Aembit has raised $25 million in Series A funding to protect non-human identities and minimize attack surface.

The post Non-Human IAM Provider Aembit Raises $25 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Non-Human IAM Provider Aembit Raises $25 Million

description:
Financial services giant Mastercard is acquiring Recorded Future from private equity firm Insight Partners for $2.6 billion.

The post Mastercard to Acquire Threat Intelligence Firm Recorded Future for $2.6 Billion appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Mastercard to Acquire Threat Intelligence Firm Recorded Future for $2.6 Billion

description:
Cisco has announced security updates that patch eight vulnerabilities in IOS XR software, including six high-severity bugs.

The post Cisco Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities in Network Operating System appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Cisco Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities in Network Operating System

description:
Hackers believed to be operating on behalf of the Iranian government have deployed malware to Iraqi government networks. 

The post Iranian Hackers Targeting Iraqi Government: Security Firm appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Iranian Hackers Targeting Iraqi Government: Security Firm

description:
Lehigh Valley Health Network has agreed to pay a $65 million settlement in a class-action suit filed over a 2023 data breach.

The post Healthcare Provider to Pay $65M Settlement Following Ransomware Attack appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Healthcare Provider to Pay $65M Settlement Following Ransomware Attack

description:
Ireland’s Data Protection Commission said it has opened an inquiry into Google’s Pathways Language Model 2, also known as PaLM2.

The post Google’s AI Model Faces European Union Scrutiny From Privacy Watchdog appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Google’s AI Model Faces European Union Scrutiny From Privacy Watchdog
